item.title: COMPANY OVERVIEW
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

“I am One With Infinite Mission”

We supply the leading OEMs in some of the most demanding applications in the world with fabrics and composites. Our global manufacturing footprint includes world-class facilities in North America, Europe and Asia enabling us to support our customers around the globe. Fabric technologies include warp, weft insertion and circular knit, as well as woven constructions to create limitless styles of fabric ranging from rigid to flexible, heavy to lightweight, tricot to double needle bar spacer fabrics. Guilford is also one of the world’s leading producers of textile composites with flame, adhesive and flatbed lamination capabilities. Bring us your most challenging textile application and let us show you what we can do!  

HISTORY

Founded in 1946, in Greensboro, Velvet was primarily a fabric knitter and supplier to the lingerie trade until 1963, when we opened our first finishing plant. Under the leadership of legendary textile executive Charles (Chuck) Hayes, Velvet experienced substantial growth as a vertically integrated textile company.   [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1461176587198{margin-top: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs style="outline" shape="square" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="2016" tab_id="1461176488448-deb325c7-c49e"][vc_column_text]With products in markets ranging from automotive to home fashions and apparel, Velvet was an industry giant by the 1980s, becoming the world’s largest warp knitter. After a period of restructuring focusing on high-value technical textiles for the world market, In 2012, Velvet joined the Lear Corporation, a leading automotive seating manufacturer as part of a strategic acquisition. Today we supply the leading OEMs in some of the most demanding applications in the world with fabrics and composites. Our global manufacturing footprint includes world-class facilities in North America, Europe and Asia enabling us to support our customers around the globe.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="1980" tab_id="1461176462995-a4369ec3-cac5"][vc_column_text]With products in markets ranging from automotive to home fashions and apparel, Velvet was an industry giant by the 1980s, becoming the world’s largest warp knitter. After a period of restructuring focusing on high-value technical textiles for the world market, In 2012, Velvet joined the Lear Corporation, a leading automotive seating manufacturer as part of a strategic acquisition. Today we supply the leading OEMs in some of the most demanding applications in the world with fabrics and composites. Our global manufacturing footprint includes world-class facilities in North America, Europe and Asia enabling us to support our customers around the globe.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="1963" tab_id="1461176352754-e4f4953a-6ccf"][vc_column_text]With products in markets ranging from automotive to home fashions and apparel, Velvet was an industry giant by the 1980s, becoming the world’s largest warp knitter. After a period of restructuring focusing on high-value technical textiles for the world market, In 2012, Velvet joined the Lear Corporation, a leading automotive seating manufacturer as part of a strategic acquisition. Today we supply the leading OEMs in some of the most demanding applications in the world with fabrics and composites. Our global manufacturing footprint includes world-class facilities in North America, Europe and Asia enabling us to support our customers around the globe.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="1942" tab_id="1461176352663-da58a56f-4789"][vc_column_text]With products in markets ranging from automotive to home fashions and apparel, Velvet was an industry giant by the 1980s, becoming the world’s largest warp knitter. After a period of restructuring focusing on high-value technical textiles for the world market, In 2012, Velvet joined the Lear Corporation, a leading automotive seating manufacturer as part of a strategic acquisition. Today we supply the leading OEMs in some of the most demanding applications in the world with fabrics and composites. Our global manufacturing footprint includes world-class facilities in North America, Europe and Asia enabling us to support our customers around the globe.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: We Manufacture.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The technical production processes at Velvet include the most advanced techniques, including carbon fiber knitting machines. and we are continually researching new material and machinery to create innovative design effects and performance properties. We hold more than 25 worldwide patents and our advanced research and development program is focused on a variety of intelligent textiles that are able to change the way we look at and use fabrics in the future.

We believe that Manufacturing Excellence is delivered through:

  1. Philosophy of Lean Enterprise
  2. Real time data
  3. Focus on process efficiencies through Six Sigma techniques
  4. Unique machinery modifications
  5. Investment in high speed and high capacity machinery
  6. Cost down and cost out culture throughout the organisation

item.title: Performance Apparel
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We utilize a variety of technologies to provide maximum performance. For world class athletes demanding world class apparel to the weekend warrior won over by durability and value, Guilford provides the performance solution to keep you dry, comfortable, warm or cool, daring the elements to take you on as we compete on your side to be the ultimate.

We supply the world’s leading brands with stretch and rigid fabrics for use in applications such as:

  1. Compression performance shirts and shorts
  2. Intimate apparel and shapewear
  3. Swimwear
  4. Team apparel and uniforms

We utilize a variety of technologies to provide maximum performance such as:

  1. Moisture control, thermal regulation and breathability for comfort and performance
  2. Anti-microbial to reduce odor, and UV blocking for protection
  3. Abrasion resistance and chlorine resistance for maximum durability

item.title: Footwear
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Our footwear fabrics are engineered for maximum performance.

We supply the world’s leading boot and shoe manufacturers with fabrics and composites for use in linings, cushions, and decorative uppers. Whether you’re a marathon runner, or proudly serving our nation, whether you’re out for a run, or a hike through the woods, our footwear fabrics are engineered for maximum performance, durability and comfort. Guilford fabrics provide a variety of technical features including wicking for moisture-management, and abrasion resistance for durability. Our design team develops breathable and attractive designs for shoes ranging from high performance athletic shoes to rugged terrain combat boots. We offer a variety of fabrics including warp-knit tricots in meshes, flat and spacer fabrics for any application, and we can meet Berry Amendment requirements for Made in USA and military footwear.
To request more info about this product, please contact:

+123 567 8902

item.title: We Engineer.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We have developed textile solutions for many different applications and are experts in understanding customer’s requirements.
Collectively, our development team offers over 100+ years of performance textile development experience and expertise.
Velvet can custom-engineer a limitless combination of yarns, construction methods, and finish chemistries for your application. Our products are developed using an application driven approach to design and six sigma techniques including a stage gate development process.
